alert.note: Alert for Imperial (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued October 06 at 2:32PM PDT until October 06 at 3:30PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Southwestern La Paz County in west central Arizona... Northeastern Imperial County in southeastern California... * Until 330 PM MST/330 PM PDT/. * At 232 PM MST/232 PM PDT/, a wall of dust was along a line extending from near Cibola to 19 miles west of Yuma Proving Ground to 10 miles west of Martinez Lake, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes CA Route 78 between mile markers 37 and 73. Locations impacted include... Cibola and Glamis. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
